page.title: 01Marlow
page.content: Marlow is a small town on the borders of the county of {Buckinghamshire.}Although it is a picturesque place on the banks of the River Thames, it has become in the last two decades a commuter town for those who work in London. Access to London is quite easy, because there are two motorways which lead to the city centre. It is also very close to London Airport. It is a great tourist attraction for many different types of visitor. Thus our pages reflect many of the attractions of the area as well as how the town of{Marlow}is growing. The pages have been put together by a group of schools.Little Marlow First School, Foxes Piece Middle School, Burford Combined School and Holy Trinity C.E. Middle School. The children are all aged between 7 and 12
